attributes.action: Stop the Enforced Insurance for All Dog Owners
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Most dog owners are responsible people who love and care for their family pet. Unfortunately there are many unwanted dogs and I believe if compulsory insurance is introduced there will be many dog owners who feel they cannot afford this extra cost. 

Insurance companies will be laughing!! 

How will it be monitored? 

Once again the good responsible pet owners are being punished.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
